entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain early in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
